statements: UPDATE sculptures SET artist_name = 'Michelangelo', materials = 'Marble' WHERE sculpture_id = 1;
UPDATE sculptures SET creation_year = 1504, provenance = 'Vatican City' WHERE sculpture_name = 'David';
UPDATE sculptures SET sculpture_name = 'The Thinker', artist_name = 'Auguste Rodin' WHERE sculpture_id = 1;
UPDATE sculptures SET materials = 'Marble, Bronze', provenance = 'Private Collection' WHERE sculpture_id = 2;
UPDATE Sculpture SET artist_name='Leonardo Da Vinci' WHERE sculpture_id=1;
UPDATE Provenance SET acquisition_date='2022-08-15', provenance_notes='Recently acquired' WHERE sculpture_id=2;
UPDATE Sculpture SET artist_name='Vincent Van Gogh', creation_date='1887-1889' WHERE sculpture_id=1;
UPDATE Provenance SET provenance_notes='Originally owned by a private collector', acquisition_date='2022-08-15' WHERE sculpture_id=2 AND provenance_id=5;
UPDATE sculptures SET artist_name='Leonardo da Vinci' WHERE sculpture_id=1;
UPDATE provenance SET collection_id=2, provenance_details='Acquired from a private collector' WHERE sculpture_id=3;
UPDATE sculptures SET artist_name='Leonardo da Vinci', creation_year=1503 WHERE sculpture_id=1;
UPDATE provenance SET provenance_details='Acquired from the Louvre Museum' WHERE sculpture_id=2 AND collection_id=3;
UPDATE sculptures SET year_created = 2000 WHERE id = 1
UPDATE artists SET nationality = 'French', birth_year = 1950 WHERE id = 3
UPDATE sculptures SET description='Beautiful bronze sculpture depicting a ballerina dancing on a pedestal', year_created=1965 WHERE id=101;
UPDATE artists SET nationality='French', birth_year=1920, death_year=2005 WHERE name='Pablo Picasso';
UPDATE Sculptures SET artist_name = 'Pablo Picasso' WHERE sculpture_id = 1;
UPDATE SculptureHistory SET description = 'Renovated and cleaned' WHERE event_id = 5;
UPDATE Sculptures SET sculpture_name = 'The Thinker', material = 'Bronze' WHERE sculpture_id = 1;
UPDATE Locations SET city = 'Paris', country = 'France' WHERE location_name = 'Louvre Museum';
